snippet: Former Senator Bob Kerrey announced Tuesday that he would not run be returning to Nebraska to run for his old U.S. Senate seat.
abstract: Former Senator Bob Kerrey announced Tuesday that he would not run be returning to Nebraska to run for his old U.S. Senate seat.
lead_paragraph: 6:02 p.m. | Updated Former Senator Bob Kerrey announced on Tuesday that he would not be returning to Nebraska to run for his old United States Senate seat.

headline.main: Kerrey Won't Run for Senate in Nebraska
